plot: Waking up with a terrible hangover in the ruins of a world destroyed by ravenous flying aliens, a failed superhero, a former Super-girl, drinks and drugs her way around a post-apocalyptic earth that she failed to save.
title: Apocalypse Girl
plot_es: Waking up with a terrible hangover in the ruins of a world destroyed by ravenous flying aliens, a failed superhero, a former Super-girl, drinks and drugs her way around a post-apocalyptic earth that she failed to save.
plot_en: Waking up with a terrible hangover in the ruins of a world destroyed by ravenous flying aliens, a failed superhero, a former Super-girl, drinks and drugs her way around a post-apocalyptic earth that she failed to save.
